BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: UNITED WAY OF NORTH IDAHO INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: UNITED WAY OF NORTH IDAHOS MISSION IS TO IMPROVE LIVES IN OUR COMMUNITY. WE DO THIS BY ENGAGING INDIVIDUALS AND ORGANIZATIONS IN OUR COMMUNITY IN A WAY THAT IS MEANINGFUL TO THEM THROUGH VOLUNTEERISM, FINANCIAL CONTRIBUTIONS, OR LEADERSHIP.
IRS990.MissionDesc: UNITED WAY OF NORTH IDAHOS MISSION IS TO IMPROVE LIVES IN OUR COMMUNITY. WE DO THIS BY ENGAGING INDIVIDUALS AND ORGANIZATIONS IN OUR COMMUNITY IN A WAY THAT IS MEANINGFUL TO THEM THROUGH VOLUNTEERISM, FINANCIAL CONTRIBUTIONS, OR LEADERSHIP.
IRS990.Desc: EARLY LEARNING FAMILY SUPPORT: THE WORK OF UNITED WAY OF NORTH IDAHO IS FOCUSED ON LONG-TERM CHANGE FOR LOW-INCOME FAMILIES AND INDIVIDUALS. HELPING US AND OUR COMMUNITY UNDERSTAND, THE UNITED WAY ALICE PROJECT HAS IDENTIFIED MORE THAN 40% OF OUR POPULATION AS FINANCIALLY UNSTABLE. THE ALICE CHILD CARE SCHOLARSHIPS HELP FAMILIES CONTINUE HIGHER EDUCATION OR STAY IN THE WORKFORCE. HUNDREDS OF FAMILIES IN THE FIVE NORTHERN COUNTIES HAVE BENEFITTED FROM THIS ASSISTANCE.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CHILD CARE PROVIDER SUPPORT: UNITED WAY OF NORTH IDAHOS EDUCATIONAL FUNDING AND COLLABORATIONS REACH PRE-K AND SCHOOL AGED YOUTH TO ENGAGE AND DEVELOP A FUTURE WORKFORCE AND STRONG COMMUNITY. INTERNALLY, OUR EFFORTS ARE FOCUSED ON SCHOOL READINESS AND EARLY GRADE READING. INVESTMENTS HAVE BEEN MADE IN IMPROVING QUALITY EDUCATION CENTERS AND INCREASING CAPACITY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: COMMUNITY CARE FUND: UNITED WAY OF NORTH IDAHO INVESTS IN HIGH PERFORMING PROGRAMS AND SERVICES THAT ALIGN WITH ITS STRATEGIC PRIORITIES OF EDUCATION, FINANCIAL STABILITY, AND HEALTH. THE COMMUNITY CARE FUND IS FUNDS DIRECTED TOWARD QUALITY LOCAL PROGRAMS THAT BENEFIT COMMUNITIES IN THE FIVE COUNTIES IT SERVES. FUNDING IS GRANTED TO NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS THROUGH A COMPETITIVE APPLICATION PROCESS.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: RIGHT OF USE ASSET - LEASE NET

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEWS THE PERFORMANCE AND APPROVES THE COMPENSATION OF THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR ON AN ANNUAL BASIS.
